explains: n. 公共卫生，环境卫生；下水道设施，卫生设备

sentences.en: Sanitation did not become widespread until the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 直到19世纪，卫生设施才开始普及。

sentences.en: The location is exceptionally poor, viewed from the sanitation point.
sentences.cn: 从卫生角度来看，这个地段非常糟糕。

sentences.en: More than 80% of those cases can be attributed to contact with contaminated water and a lack of proper sanitation.
sentences.cn: 这些病例的80%以上可归因于接触了受污染的水和缺乏适当的卫生设施。
